franchises.name: Alice in the Country of Hearts

name: Clover no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
storyline: Alice didn't fall in love with anyone, and remained in the wonder world. All the characters that appeared in the previous title are already her friends. She knows them well, so it's kinda hard to fall in love with them. There are more exciting battle elements and more fantastic elements included. Will she be able to fall in love with someone in this world full of wonders...?
summary: Clover no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World is the second installment in the Heart no Kuni no Alice series and the direct sequel to Heart no Kuni no Alice. It was originally released in December 2007 for PC and later released for the PS2 and PSP.
